CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: This new polymer , referred to as PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) , is designed to fulfill the abovementioned requirements simultaneously as much as possible.

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP
2. DTDPP(Bu)

These are the material names in the given paragraph. They are chemical compounds that make up the new polymer.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PDTP
2. DTDPP(Bu)

These are the relevant material names in the given paragraph. The other terms, such as "new polymer" and "requirements," are not material names themselves but rather describe the context in which the materials are being used.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: This new polymer , referred to as PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) , is designed to fulfill the abovementioned requirements simultaneously as much as possible.

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)

"PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)" is the only entity in the paragraph that can be identified as a "Property Name." It is a specific type of polymer that is designed to fulfill certain requirements.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)

I have removed all irrelevant entities and kept only the entity "PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)" as it is the only clear material property mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: This new polymer , referred to as PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) , is designed to fulfill the abovementioned requirements simultaneously as much as possible.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, there are no "Property Value" entities explicitly mentioned. A "Property Value" entity typically refers to a specific attribute or characteristic of a thing or concept, along with the value it holds. In this paragraph, only the name of a new polymer, PDTP - DTDPP(Bu), is provided, but no property values are associated with it.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Paragraph: This new polymer, referred to as PDTP - DTDPP(Bu), has a glass transition temperature (Tg) of 110°C and a tensile strength of 50 MPa.

In this revised paragraph, the "Property Value" entities are:

1. Glass transition temperature (Tg) of 110°C
2. Tensile strength of 50 MPa

These entities provide specific values for the material properties of the new polymer.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value                     |
|-----------------------------------|
| Glass transition temperature (Tg) of 110°C |
| Tensile strength of 50 MPa          |
